title: Fight at bachelor party ends with stolen $35K Rolex
text: LOUISVILLE, KY (WAVE) - What should have been a night of fun landed two men in jail after a fight during a bachelor party last month. Hunter Campbell and Edward Joiner III were at a bachelor party on June 25. Arrest reports for Campbell and Joiner state they got into a fight with another man attending the party while riding in a limousine. The driver of the limousine pulled over and the fight continued in a parking lot. MORE FROM WAVE3.COM+ Deputies injured when 2 police vehicles collide+ Search efforts intensify for missing woman+ VIDEO: Officer run over by suspect A fourth man tried to break up the fight and was also assaulted, according to the reports. The first victim told police his $35,000 Rolex watch was taken by Campbell and Joiner. It was later found with extensive damage, along with a chain that also belonged to the victim. Campbell was arrested on July 7; Joiner was arrested on July 11. Both men are charged with two counts of assault and one count of robbery. Copyright 2016 WAVE 3 News. All rights reserved.
